comment: This is a mighty tasting whiskey! On the nose I get honey, wildflower, bready & maybe flaxseed/oats,  the palate is more honey with wildflower, burnt sugar with a a hint of char and the finish is you guessed it more honey! Two thoughts, first was maybe 8 months was too long to age in the Mead barrel and secondly how this compares to the Belle Meade Honey? Cheers all!
The mead flavor is a little too strong for a sipper,  but it makes a wonderful mead-hattan.

Nose: Sweet honey, corn
Taste: syrupy, dark honey, vanilla
Finish: Licorice, long heat, spice
